Footer.description: The smart comparator for mountain resorts. Find the perfect destination for your needs.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Have a question or a suggestion? We'd love to hear from you.

form.success: Message sent successfully! We will get back to you soon.
form.error: Error sending message. Please try again.

About.title: About Alpe Match
About.subtitle: Discover the vision behind the smartest mountain comparator.
About.mission_desc: Alpe Match was born from a passion for the mountains and the need for a truly intelligent tool to compare Alpine destinations. Our goal is to provide a free, impartial, and data-driven service to help every mountain lover find their perfect match.
About.free_desc: We believe that information should be accessible. Alpe Match is and will always be a free resource for the community.
About.creator_desc: Passionate about technology and the outdoors, Corrado created this platform to simplify the holiday planning process using modern AI and real-time data.
About.tech_desc: We use advanced AI to analyze thousands of data points, ensuring that our recommendations are accurate and always up to date.

Directory.title: Mountain Index & Insights
Directory.subtitle: Complete SEO index of all descriptions and services analyzed by Alpe Match. Each link leads to a deep-dive on specific mountain characteristics.
Directory.no_data: No data found in the index.

Home.hero_subtitle: The first intelligent comparator for mountain resorts, created to create the perfect match between each person and their ideal destination.
Home.featured_subtitle: The most searched locations at the moment.
Home.no_featured: No featured destinations at the moment.
Home.why_use_subtitle: We analyze hundreds of data points to offer impartial and detailed comparisons.
Home.value_prop_1_desc: We collect verified information on slopes, hotels, and services from multiple sources.
Home.value_prop_2_desc: Compare up to 4 locations side-by-side to choose without doubts.
Home.value_prop_3_desc: View only the information relevant to the season you are interested in.

Locations.title: Alpine Destinations
Locations.subtitle: Explore the best mountain resorts. Filter, analyze, and find your next perfect goal.
Locations.no_results: No locations found in the database.

Search.title: Find an Alpine resort
Search.no_results: No results found matching your criteria.
Search.hero_subtitle: Explore by name, activity, atmosphere or unique features.
Search.no_results_desc: Try searching for something else or remove filters.

Metadata.default_description: Compare the best ski and mountain resorts. Discover features, services, prices and seasonality for your perfect holiday in the Alps.
Metadata.og_description: Analyze and compare hundreds of mountain destinations. Updated data on lifts, accommodation and activities.
Metadata.twitter_description: Compare mountain destinations for every season.
Metadata.compare_description: Compare slopes, prices, services and reviews of different ski resorts side-by-side.
Metadata.map_description: Explore the interactive map of mountain resorts. View location, altitude and geographic features.
Metadata.search_description: Filter locations by tags, services, region, and features. Find the perfect destination with our advanced search engine.
Metadata.locations_description: Browse the complete list of the best mountain resorts. Discover hidden gems and famous destinations in the Alps.

Match.title: Find your ideal mountain destination
Match.subtitle: Answer a few simple questions and let our AI find the ideal mountain destination for you.

steps.season: When are you planning to go?
steps.vibe: What's the vibe you're looking for?
steps.activities: What do you love to do?
steps.nation: Do you have a preferred country?

Match.no_matches: We couldn't find a perfect match, but here are some popular destinations.

Common.suggest_location_desc: Help us expand! Suggest a new mountain resort and we'll analyze it for the community.
